brand.name: Tax Star
brand.primaryCTA: Sign up for a free trial or book a demo

valueProps.text: Streamlines corporate tax processes, enhancing workflow efficiency.
Helps businesses stay compliant with tax laws, avoiding penalties and ensuring timely filings.
Reduces the need for additional staffing while increasing client capacity through automation.

pains: Reducing reliance on manual tools like Word and Excel
proof: Automated Workflows save up to 40% of time on tax calculations
Enables firms to handle 30-40% more clients without increasing staff overhead

facts.text: Tax Star provides AI-powered corporate tax software specifically designed for businesses in the UAE.
facts.evidence: Tax Star provides AI-powered corporate tax software specifically designed for businesses in the UAE.

facts.text: The platform includes e-invoicing solutions and Zakat calculations for businesses in Saudi Arabia.
facts.evidence: It also includes e-invoicing solutions and Zakat calculations for businesses in Saudi Arabia.

facts.text: Automates tax return processes, ensuring timely and accurate submissions.
facts.evidence: AI-Powered Corporate Tax Calculator: Automates tax return processes, ensuring timely and accurate submissions.

facts.text: Facilitates easy production of financial statements, reducing reliance on manual tools like Word and Excel.
facts.evidence: IFRS Financial Statements: Facilitates easy production of financial statements, reducing reliance on manual tools like Word and Excel.

facts.text: Notifies users of upcoming document expirations to avoid penalties.
facts.evidence: Document Expiry Reminders: Notifies users of upcoming document expirations to avoid penalties.

facts.text: Automated reminders and tracking ensure compliance with tax regulations and deadlines.
facts.evidence: Compliance Tracking: Automated reminders and tracking ensure compliance with tax regulations and deadlines.

facts.text: Saves up to 40% of time on tax calculations, allowing teams to focus on higher-value tasks.
facts.evidence: Automated Workflows: Saves up to 40% of time on tax calculations, allowing teams to focus on higher-value tasks.

facts.text: Enables firms to handle 30-40% more clients without increasing staff overhead through efficient automated workflows.
facts.evidence: Scalability: Enables firms to handle 30-40% more clients without increasing staff overhead through efficient automated workflows.

facts.text: Helps businesses stay compliant with tax laws, avoiding penalties and ensuring timely filings.
facts.evidence: Compliance Assurance: Helps businesses stay compliant with tax laws, avoiding penalties and ensuring timely filings.

facts.text: E-Invoicing ensures invoices are compliant with FTA regulations and integrates seamlessly with corporate tax filing.
facts.evidence: E-Invoicing (UAE): Ensures invoices are compliant with FTA regulations and integrates seamlessly with corporate tax filing.

facts.text: Zakat for Business provides tailored solutions for Zakat calculations, aligning with overall compliance reporting.
facts.evidence: Zakat for Business (KSA): Tailored solutions for Zakat calculations, aligning with overall compliance reporting.

facts.text: Video tutorials, podcasts, webinars, and blogs are available to assist users.
